name: A-Maze-In Ghost's
description:
With a great deal of help from the GameDev.TV courses I have managed to put together this maze game. Please take a look and let me know what your think, It still needs work, but for the Gamejam I am happy this is ready!

Unlock all 5 mazes within the time limit by searching for the keys and finding the exit. 

Hint: Look up you may see a clue.

Watch out for the ghosts they will slow your down!!!
